topic.title: Configure Hostgroup Parameters
topic.shortdesc: Most hostgroup parameters are configured using an ERB file. This makes configuration quicker and easier than using the Foreman interface.

ol.li:
Edit the dell-pilot.yaml.erb file.
Change the variables between the lines marked Variables to Change.
Change the variables between the lines marked End of Variable to Change. The most common variables that require changes have values of CHANGEME_*.
Install the rubygen-foreman_api package, in order to apply the changes in the dell-pilot.yaml.erb file:# yum install -y rubygem-foreman_api
